question: What is the capital of the Republic of Congo?
explanation: Brazzaville is the capital of the Republic of Congo. In 2013, Brazzaville was designated "City of Music" by UNESCO. It is also a member of the Creative Cities Network. It is located to the north of the Congo River just below the Pool Malebo. Libreville is the capital of Gabon. Kinshasa is the capital of the Democratic Republic of Congo. Luanda is the capital of Angola.
